attributes.action: Support private childcare settings (e.g nurseries) during the Covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: These settings will still have overheads and staff costs to cover. Support would allow them to reduce charges to parents, who may also be struggling financially at this time.
attributes.background:
We would like them to provide financial support for private childcare providers (nurseries, pre-schools, childminders etc) if they are forced to close during the current pandemic.
.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301836

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
